hero_carousel.book_description: Discover the proven framework that has helped hundreds of professionals break through self-doubt and take decisive action in their careers and lives.
hero_carousel.coaching_description: Break through barriers, overcome self-doubt, and achieve the success you deserve with personalized one-on-one coaching.
hero_carousel.mentor_subtitle: Elevate Your Coaching Practice to New Heights
hero_carousel.mentor_description: Fast-track your ICF certification and build a thriving coaching practice with expert guidance and proven systems.
hero_carousel.mastermind_subtitle: Accelerate Your Growth with Like-Minded Professionals
hero_carousel.mastermind_description: Connect with ambitious professionals, share challenges, and achieve breakthrough results in our supportive mastermind community.

about_homepage.description1: I'm Monica Leggett, a Professional Certified Coach (PCC) with over 15 years of experience helping individuals and businesses transform their lives. My journey from self-doubt to confidence inspired me to help others break free from limiting beliefs.
about_homepage.description2: Through my proven 8-step framework, I've guided 500+ clients from feeling stuck and overwhelmed to living with clarity, confidence, and purpose. Whether you're seeking personal transformation, building a coaching practice, or looking for community support, I'm here to help you take decisive action.

services_homepage.book_description: Start your transformation journey with 'Doubtful to Decisive' - your roadmap to breaking through barriers and achieving your goals.
services_homepage.coaching_description: Get personalized one-on-one support to overcome challenges, set clear goals, and create lasting change in your life.

testimonials_homepage.name: Sarah M.
testimonials_homepage.title: Marketing Director
testimonials_homepage.quote: Monica's 8-step framework completely transformed how I approach challenges. I went from feeling stuck to landing my dream job!

testimonials_homepage.name: John D.
testimonials_homepage.title: Business Owner
testimonials_homepage.quote: The mastermind group gave me the accountability and support I needed to finally launch my business. Monica is an incredible facilitator.

testimonials_homepage.name: Lisa R.
testimonials_homepage.title: ICF Certified Coach
testimonials_homepage.quote: Monica's mentor coaching program fast-tracked my certification. Her guidance was invaluable in building my practice.

about_page.intro_text: Professional Certified Coach (PCC) with 15+ years of experience helping individuals and businesses transform their lives. Past ICF Chapter President (2019) and author of 'Doubtful to Decisive'.

about_page.philosophy_quote: I believe everyone has the answers within them â€“ sometimes you just need a skilled partner to help you uncover them.
about_page.personal_story: One of 10 children, I learned early how to communicate effectively and help others find their voice. Married for 37 years, I'm a mother and grandmother who understands the challenges of balancing personal and professional growth. My own journey from corporate burnout to purposeful living inspired me to help others make similar transformations.

contact_page.contact_intro: Ready to take the next step in your transformation journey? I'd love to hear from you. Whether you're interested in coaching, have questions about my book, or want to explore working together, don't hesitate to reach out.
contact_page.office_hours:
Monday - Thursday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM EST
Friday: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM EST
Weekends: By appointment only
contact_page.calendar_description: Ready to explore how we can work together? Book a complimentary 30-minute discovery call to discuss your goals and see if we're a good fit.

footer.about_text: Monica Leggett is a Professional Certified Coach, author, and speaker dedicated to helping professionals move from doubt to decisive action. Transform your life with proven strategies and personalized support.
footer.newsletter_description: Get weekly insights, coaching tips, and inspiration delivered to your inbox.
